00029 #include "CalvinCHPFileUpdater.h"
00030 #include "CalvinCHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter.h"
00031 
00032 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00033 
00034 CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter::CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter()
00035 {
00036         m_BufferSize = 0;
00037         m_MaxBufferSize = MAX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00038 }
00039 
00040 CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter::~CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter()
00041 {
00042         FlushBuffer();
00043         Cleanup();
00044 }
00045 
00046 void CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter::Cleanup()
00047 {
00048         for (int target=0; target<m_TargetQuantificationBuffers.size(); target++) 
00049         { 
00050                 m_TargetQuantificationBuffers[target].erase(m_TargetQuantificationBuffers[target].begin(), m_TargetQuantificationBuffers[target].end());
00051         }
00052         m_TargetQuantificationBuffers.erase(m_TargetQuantificationBuffers.begin(), m_TargetQuantificationBuffers.end());
00053 }
00054 
00055 void CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter::Initialize(std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames)
00056 {
00057         m_CHPFileNames = CHPFileNames;
00058         Cleanup();
00059         for (int i=0; i<m_CHPFileNames->size(); i++)
00060         {
00061                 std::vector<float> quantificationBuffer;
00062                 m_TargetQuantificationBuffers.push_back(quantificationBuffer);
00063                 m_TargetQuantificationRowIndexes.push_back(0);
00064         }
00065         m_BufferSize = 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter::WriteQuantificationEntry(int target, float quantification)
00069 {
00070         m_TargetQuantificationBuffers[target].push_back(quantification);
00071         m_BufferSize += sizeof(float);
00072         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00073         {
00074                 FlushBuffer();
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078 void CHPQuantificationFileBufferWriter::FlushBuffer()
00079 {
00080         if(m_BufferSize > 0) {
00081                 for (int target=0; target<m_CHPFileNames->size(); target++)
00082                 {
00083                         CalvinCHPFileUpdater updater;
00084                         updater.OpenCHPFile((*m_CHPFileNames)[target].c_str());
00085                         updater.UpdateExpressionQuantificationBuffer(m_TargetQuantificationRowIndexes[target], m_TargetQuantificationBuffers[target]);
00086                         updater.CloseCHPFile();
00087                         m_TargetQuantificationRowIndexes[target] += m_TargetQuantificationBuffers[target].size();
00088                         m_TargetQuantificationBuffers[target].clear();
00089                 }
00090         }
00091         m_BufferSize = 0;
00092 }
